verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֣ר ׀ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and take מֵֽאִתָּ֡ם <S%H853><s%> מַטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> rods מַטֶּה֩ <S%H4294><s%> upon his rod לְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אָ֜ב <S%H1><s%> of [their] fathers מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְשִֽׂיאֵהֶם֙ <S%H5387><s%> of all their princes לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten מַטּ֑וֹת <S%H4294><s%> his rod אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thou every man's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> name תִּכְתֹּ֖ב <S%H3789><s%> write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מַטֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H4294><s%> rods

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron's תִּכְתֹּ֖ב <S%H3789><s%> And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> upon the rod לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מַטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> rod אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> for one לְרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [shall be] for the head בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

וְהִנַּחְתָּ֖ם <S%H3240><s%> And thou shalt lay them up בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before הָֽעֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> the testimony אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> I אִוָּעֵ֥ד <S%H3259><s%> where I will meet לָכֶ֖ם שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> It

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will come הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] the man's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אֶבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> whom I shall choose בּ֖וֹ מַטֵּ֣הוּ <S%H4294><s%> rod יִפְרָ֑ח <S%H6524><s%> shall blossom וַהֲשִׁכֹּתִ֣י <S%H7918><s%> and I will make to cease מֵֽעָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּלֻנּוֹת֙ <S%H8519><s%> from me the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like מַלִּינִ֖ם <S%H3885><s%> whereby they murmur עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave אֵלָ֣יו ׀ <S%H413><s%> and כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְשִֽׂיאֵיהֶ֡ם <S%H5387><s%> and every one of their princes מַטֶּה֩ <S%H4294><s%> rods לְנָשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> leader אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> apiece מַטֶּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> and the rod לְנָשִׂ֤יא <S%H5387><s%> their leaders אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> each לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> houses אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> according to their fathers' שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten מַטּ֑וֹת <S%H4294><s%> their rods וּמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> their rods אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [was] among מַטּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4294><s%> the rod

וַיַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> laid up מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּטֹּ֖ת <S%H4294><s%> the rods לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> of witness

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass that on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> went מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle הָעֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> of witness וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold פָּרַ֥ח <S%H6524><s%> was budded מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> and behold the rod אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi וַיֹּ֤צֵֽא <S%H3318><s%> and brought forth פֶ֙רַח֙ <S%H6525><s%> buds וַיָּ֣צֵֽץ <S%H6692><s%> and bloomed צִ֔יץ <S%H6731><s%> blossoms וַיִּגְמֹ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> and yielded שְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <S%H8247><s%> almonds

וַיֹּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> brought out מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּטֹּת֙ <S%H4294><s%> all the rods מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> and they looked וַיִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> and took אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מַטֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H4294><s%> his rod ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הָשֵׁ֞ב <S%H7725><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> rod אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> Aaron's לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> the testimony לְמִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> to be kept לְא֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> for a token לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> against מֶ֑רִי <S%H4805><s%> the rebels וּתְכַ֧ל <S%H3615><s%> and thou shalt quite take away תְּלוּנֹּתָ֛ם <S%H8519><s%> their murmurings מֵעָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> from me that they die

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [so] as the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> him so did ס

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> spake בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold גָּוַ֛עְנוּ <S%H1478><s%> Behold we die אָבַ֖דְנוּ <S%H6><s%> we perish כֻּלָּ֥נוּ <S%H3605><s%> are all אָבָֽדְנוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> we all perish

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone הַקָּרֵ֧ב ׀ <S%H7131><s%> Whosoever cometh any thing near הַקָּרֵ֛ב <S%H7131><s%> near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> unto the tabernacle יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die הַאִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> lo תַּ֖מְנוּ <S%H8552><s%> shall we be consumed לִגְוֹֽעַ׃ <S%H1478><s%> with dying ס
